NewsArticle.Title: DA Patch 7.37
NewsArticle.Content: DA Version 7.37 On Wednesday, May 22nd, Dark Ages will be patching to version 7.37 Patching Issues with Vista & Windows7/8: Please "right-click" your Darkages.exe icon and choose "Run as administrator" Patch notes *Adding new items to the Itemshop *Rear Strike 4 & 5 will be available
